Component: Tooltip

Introduction

Helping to give additional context since '95

Rules for Tooltips

  1. Never go full tooltip. Don't over use the screen full of tooltips.
  2. Never put a whole story inside a tooltip. Keep it concise and to the point.

Types of Tooltips

Tooltips can be added to icons or text

Default Tooltip


Bacon ipsum
▲ 
<br>
<span class="tsla-tooltip" data-tooltip="Brisket sausage bacon jerky">Bacon ipsum</span>

Tooltip Options

Added to icon


Bacon ipsum
▲ 
<br>
<div class="sample-text">Bacon ipsum <span class="tsla-tooltip west-north" data-tooltip="Brisket sausage bacon jerky"><i class="tsla-icon-info--circle"></i></span></div>

Added to text link


Bacon ipsum dolor amet turducken ham.

Landjaeger shankle pastrami fatback.
▲ 
<br>
<div class="sample-text">Bacon ipsum dolor amet turducken <span class="tsla-tooltip link south-west" data-tooltip="Tenderloin short loin shankle sausage">ham</span>.</div>
<br>
<div class="sample-text">Landjaeger shankle pastrami <span class="tsla-tooltip link south-west" data-tooltip="Chuck venison short ribs pork loin, kielbasa prosciutto bresaola pork chop kevin brisket picanha leberkas salami turducken hamburger. Ball tip filet mignon pancetta jerky andouille sirloin. Capicola chicken burgdoggen, strip steak ball tip salami turkey. Shoulder cupim meatloaf andouille chicken swine hamburger short ribs ham hock fatback leberkas picanha tenderloin salami brisket. Pork chop meatloaf shank flank bacon, leberkas beef frankfurter rump bresaola ham hock capicola.">fatback</span>.</div>

Animated easing animate

$tool-tip-transition - the distance the tooltip will slide in (defaulted to 4px)

$tool-tip-transition-time - the time it will take the tooltip to appear (defaulted to 0.25s)


Bacon ipsum dolor amet turducken ham.
▲ 
<br>
<div class="sample-text">Bacon ipsum dolor amet turducken <span class="tsla-tooltip animate link south-west" data-tooltip="hock beef ribs">ham</span>.</div>

Tooltip Arrow Location (non-mobile screens only)

On mobile it will always default to the top side, and auto aligning to the link

Uses the compass layout for direction of where the arrow pops out relative to the tooltip.

Remember NESW?

Never Eat Shredded Wheat.

Bacon ipsum dolor amet turducken.
north-west
Bacon ipsum dolor amet turducken.
north-east
Bacon ipsum dolor amet turducken.
south-west
Bacon ipsum dolor amet turducken.
south-east
Bacon ipsum dolor amet turducken.
west-north
Bacon ipsum dolor amet turducken.
west-south
Bacon ipsum dolor amet turducken.
east-north
